basics.name: Kelly Tam
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences with a Minor in Buisness at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2026.

work.summary: Provide personalized academic assistance to students outside of traditional classroom settings, offering one-on-one guidance to enhance understanding and performance in specific subjects.
highlights: Utilize effective communication skills to relay academic information and growth to parents
Create effective and enjoyable lessons to engage each individual student

work.summary: Sales Associate responsible for assisting customers, restocking shelves, and maintaining the store's appearance during peak shopping seasons.
highlights: Contributing to a positive shopping experience

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Distinction awarded to undergraduate students who (1) earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.
